title: Aurora James
description: WEARY. DESPERATE. BROKE.I did what I had to do to save her.I sold my soul to survive.I fell in love with the devil himself.I'm Aurora James, and this is my story. DANGEROUS. MENACING. FORMIDABLE.He is darkness and danger; I am his light.He is cold and ruthless; I am his warmth.He is a heartless pimp; I am his whore. And this is our beginning.
author: Jessica Ingro
